messages.title: A Fresh Start for Durham
messages.content: Labour has let Durham down. It's time for a change.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposes police commissioner post; supports community policing.
Against charging hospital staff, patients, and visitors for parking.

issues.economy: Supports cutting VAT on home insulation and cutting national insurance for small businesses.
issues.education: Plans to put 3,330 more teachers in North East classrooms.
issues.environment: Wants to plant one million trees and cut VAT on home insulation.
issues.governance: Supports fixed term parliaments and cutting taxes on savings. Opposes police commissioner post.

housing.content: Craig Martin and the Lib Dems will make sure we protect the Green Belt and have housing thatâ€™s affordable for everyone.
